p: There was a moderate positive correlation (r = 0.57) between knowledge and attitude scores (p < 0.001); attitude scores increase as knowledge scores are increasing. There was a moderate positive correlation (r = 0.55) between knowledge and practice scores (p < 0.001); practice scores increase as knowledge scores are increasing. There was a strong positive correlation (r = 0.67) between was observed between attitude scores and practice scores (p < 0.001) (Table 4).
